product_name: REI Classic Duffel Bag - XX Large
long_description: Cavernous only begins to describe our XX Large REI Classic duffel bag, which swallows up 9,150 cu. in. worth of gear, clothing or whatever else you can fit in it, and comes with its own suff sack. Urethane-coated 1,000-denier nylon is highly water resistant and very tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Tote duffel bag comfortably with the adjustable shoulder strap, included. Convenient storage sack doubles as a toiletry bag.
short_description: Cavernous only begins to describe our XX Large REI Classic duffel bag, which swallows up 9,150 cu. in. worth of gear, clothing or whatever else you can fit in it, and comes with its own suff sack.
